thread.section_title: The French Quarters Guest Apartments - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Restaurant District!
thread.title_full: Restaurant District! - Review of The French Quarters Guest Apartments, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: travelercw2016
title: Restaurant District!
text:
Super home-like feeling at this quaint Apartment/condos. Walking distance to Times Square with lots of restaurants to stop at in between. Fair prices and excellent service on all. Love to nice walk off Time Square but yet close to get there when you want. Loads of places to stop and shop and eat. Apartment front door just needs work on closing a little less noisy.
Room Tip: Bands play downstairs and across the street Go out and enjoy yourself and stay out late, it is NEW... See more room tips
